A Place for Doctors and a Place for Naturopaths The 7 Step Therapeutic Order The Therapeutic Order was first proposed by Harry Spitler ND in 1948, and then later modified Snider ND and Jared Zeff ND. In this theory it is shown that there's a place for Natural Medicine and a place for Conventional Medicine depending on the progressive stage of disease into which we fall. In the diagram below, progression of disease can be likened to beginning at the bottom of the pyramid and if left untreated eventually working its way to the top of the pyramid where surgery and pharmaceuticals become necessary. Each step is illustrated by the approach to treating the condition, to the stage in which it has progressed. It may be that you have a condition that can no longer be treated naturopathically, which necessitates conventional medicine treatment. Then again, your condition could be such that you are only at step one or two, in which case your naturopath might recommend modifying your diet and might give remedies to stimulate the healing power of nature, resulting in a reversal of symptoms. To read more about the seven level therapeutic order, click [here](/pages/the-seven-level-therapeutic-order). What really happens when you die? Prepare Yourself for the Dangers of the 5G Network A new form of EMR radiation has become a part of your environment ...... [Physicians for Safe Technology](https://mdsafetech.org/problems/5g/) say on their web site "Although 5G only penetrates the outer layers of skin, elements in the skin can act as a mini antennas radiating the RF frequencies deeper into the body and signalling the nervous, endocrine and immune system with broad adverse effects. There has been no pre market testing of 5G. It is assumed safe if it does not burn the skin. Like prior 2G, 3G and 4G networks, they are considered dangerous only if they heat the body. FCC guidelines are only based on heat. There has been no consideration for adverse biological effects found at non thermal levels in a multitude of studies on 2G, 3G or 4G. In addition, 5G technology has a disturbing data gap with regards to research on human or environmental safety, that is even admitted by industry. No studies done, no harm seen." So we are only ASSUMING it will be safe - there is no scientific evidence indicating that it WILL be safe.
